item.title: ‘Medicare for All’? These doctors say it’s possible — if healthcare takes its medicine.
item.description: To lower costs, doctors must stop overtreating and Washington needs to stop playing politics with our health.

item.title: Massive power outage strikes Spain and Portugal.
item.description: The exact cause of the widespread outage was still unclear roughly two hours later.

item.title: Domino’s U.S. same-store sales slip as cooling economy chills pizza maker’s profit
item.description: Domino’s international business provides a lift to results, but its stock falls in premarket trading.

item.title: Stocks have had a good bounce. But here’s why this investment manager thinks lows will be retested.
item.description: Dan Niles worries that we’ve just seen a bear market rally and valuations are still too high

item.title: If a financial adviser wants to roll over your retirement savings, watch out
item.description: Follow your money: Older investors especially might end up in worse financial shape after a rollover.
